product_name: Canari Canari Ultra Pro Bike Shorts - Men's - Closeout
long_description: The Canari Ultra Pro bike shorts feature 8-panel construction and a performance fabric blend to manage moisture and make your cycling adventures more comfortable-and fun. Dryline(R) fabric moves sweat from the inside, quickly transferring it to the outside for cooling and fast drying. Molded chamois manages moisture and has a soft microsuede surface for comfort next to skin. Soft-touch leg grippers help keep shorts in place. Closeout.
short_description: The Canari Ultra Pro bike shorts feature 8-panel construction and a performance fabric blend to manage moisture and make your cycling adventures more comfortable-and fun.
